content:
Subject: Top Position - Dominate Your Local Market with SEO and Google Ads

Hey [Prospect's Name],

[Your Name] here from Top Position. Ready to crush your competition and own your local market with powerful SEO and Google Ads?

(Allow them to respond.)

Here's the deal: Your business has huge potential. Rank higher in local search results, run effective Google Ads, get more clients, more revenue, and dominate your market.

1. How important is being the go-to choice for local customers to you?

(Allow them to respond and acknowledge their answer.)

1. For local SEO and Google Ads, are you playing to win or just not to lose?

(If they say they're playing to win, ask what they're doing to ensure victory. If they say they're playing not to lose, continue with the next question.)

1. Picture your business on the first page of local search results and your ads converting like crazy. What does that do for your bottom line?

(Allow them to respond and acknowledge their answer.)

Top Position helps you become the number one choice with powerful SEO and Google Ads. Proven strategies, relentless drive, dominate local search results, and skyrocket revenue.

1. Ready to commit to success and invest in becoming the number one choice through SEO and Google Ads?

(If they say yes, continue with the next question.)

Great! Let's discuss our services in detail. I have two time slots for a 15-minute call tomorrow: [Proposed Time A] and [Proposed Time B]. Which one works for you?

(If they say no or not interested:)

No worries. Remember, when you're ready to dominate, we'll be here. Have an amazing day!

(End the call)

Personalize the script by researching the prospect's business before the call and adjust your approach based on their responses.
